text:
Hey there, I assume you’ve checked out the docs on this, right? From what I understand this feature extension is intended to enrich your HubSpot records with data *outside* of HubSpot. Please someone correct me if I’m wrong, but properties in the sense of these cards is respective the _card properties_ which are different from _crm properties._ 

You then can send this data additionally to your properties in the crm. You can achive this by using the _propertiesToSend_ parameter.
